TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SiteMap extends System.Object
public ref class SiteMap abstract sealed

summary.span: 类是站点的导航结构在内存中的表示形式，导航结构由一个或多个站点地图提供程序提供。

span.span: The class is an in-memory representation of the navigation structure for a site, which is provided by one or more site map providers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 站点地图与 、和其他控件结合使用， 可为用户提供有效的导航界面以导航网站。Site maps are used in conjunction with the , , and other controls to render an effective navigation interface for users to navigate a Web site. 对象是 ASP.NET 站点导航基础结构的一个组件，它为使用导航和控件的页面和控件开发人员提供对只读站点地图信息的访问 。A object is a component of the ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure that provides access to read-only site map information for page and control developers using navigation and controls. ASP.NET 站点导航基础结构的其他组件包括 和 类、Web web.sitemap 文件以及使用类的各种控件（如 控件）来呈现内容和菜单。Other components of the ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure include the and classes, the Web.sitemap file, and the various controls that work with the class, such as the control, to render content and menus. 具有若干函数：The has several functions: - 它提供站点导航层次结构的根节点（只能有一个根节点）。It provides the root node of the site navigation hierarchy (there can be only one root node). - 它标识哪个站点地图提供程序是主体或默认的提供程序。It identifies which site map provider is the principal, or default, provider. - 它跟踪所有用于创建的提供程序对象 。It keeps track of all the provider objects that are used to create the . 从根本上讲， 是对象的分层集合的容器 。Fundamentally, the is a container for a hierarchical collection of objects. 但是， 并不维护节点之间的关系; 相反，它将此委托委托给站点地图提供程序。However, the does not maintain the relationships between the nodes; rather, it delegates this to the site map providers. 充当 由这些站点地图提供程序持有的站点导航信息（以对象的形式）的接口。The acts as an interface to the site navigation information (in the form of objects) that is held by these site map providers. 它会跟踪提供程序，从中可以访问站点导航数据并公开其 集合。It keeps track of the providers from which it can access site navigation data and exposes its collection. 提供程序可以通过任何方式存储它的站点地图信息-只要它扩展了 抽象类，就 可以从中成功初始化该类。A provider can store its site map information in any way - as long as it extends the abstract class, the class can be initialized successfully from it. 类的默认提供程序 为 类，该类与 XML 配置文件 web.sitemap 一起使用。The default provider for the class is the class, which works with an XML configuration file, Web.sitemap. 不过，您可以编写自己的 对象，并使用它来初始化站点的站点图。However, you can write your own object, and use it to initialize the site map for your site. 有关自定义站点地图提供程序的示例，请参见 。For an example of a custom site map provider, see . 指定管理站点导航配置的默认站点地图配置。A default site map configuration is specified that manages the site navigation configuration. 如果你选择编写自己的站点地图提供程序，则可以在 Web.config 文件中覆盖此配置。You can override this configuration in the Web.config file, should you choose to write your own site map provider. 类仅提供静态成员的性能，并且可以在给定站点中的任何时间通过 Web 窗体或 web 服务器控件进行访问。The class offers only static members for performance and it can be accessed at any time in a given site from a Web Form or Web server control. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何在 Web.config 文件中声明站点地图提供程序。The first code example demonstrates how to declare a site map provider in a Web.config file. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 对象。The second code example demonstrates how to use a object. 下面的代码示例是一个 Web.config 配置节，该配置节演示如何 将对象声明为默认 对象。The following code example is a Web.config configuration section that demonstrates how an object is declared as the default object. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何 通过访问对象的静态成员来显示有关和属性的信息，从而使用对象 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object by accessing its static members to display information about the and properties. 将其与由控件呈现的输出进行比较 。Compare it to the output that is rendered by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_3/CS/sitemapcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_3/VB/sitemapvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Site Navigation Overview
ASP.NET Site Maps

related.span: ASP.NET 站点导航提供程序

span.span: ASP.NET Site Navigation Providers

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CurrentNode As SiteMapNode
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ CurrentNode { System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个表示当前被请求的页的 控件。

span.span: Gets a control that represents the currently requested page.

value.span: 表示当前被请求的页的 实例；如果站点地图信息中不存在代表节点，则为 。

span.span: A instance that represents the currently requested page; otherwise, , if no representative node exists in the site map information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类 通过从提供程序请求来检索属性。The class retrieves the property by requesting it from the provider. 如果站点地图信息中的页不存在任何具有代表性的节点，或者如果启用了安全修整且无法为当前用户返回节点， `null` 则返回。If no representative node exists for the page in the site map information, or if security trimming is enabled and the node cannot be returned for the current user, `null` is returned. 如果存在一个或多个订阅，则默认的站点地图提供程序会引发事件。The event is raised by the default site map provider if one or more subscriptions exist. 如果实现自己 的对象，则可以创建自己的机制来查找和检索 。If you implement your own object, you might create your own mechanism to find and retrieve the . 但是，如果扩展 类并使用基于 URL 的方案来标识页，则可以重写 方法。However, if you extend the class and use a URL-based scheme to identify pages, you can override the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来检索 表示当前页的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the object that represents the current page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/CS/catalogcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/VB/catalogvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The site map feature is not enabled.

exception.span: 配置中指定的默认提供程序不存在。

span.span: The default provider specified in the configuration does not exist.

exception.span: 只有在低信任或以上设置的情况下运行时，才支持此功能。

span.span: The feature is supported only when running in Low trust or higher.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Enabled As Boolean
public: static property bool Enabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示 Web.config 文件中是否指定了某个站点地图提供程序，以及是否启用了该站点地图提供程序。

span.span: Gets a Boolean value indicating if a site map provider is specified in the Web.config file and if the site map provider is enabled.

value.span: 如果配置并启用了某个站点地图提供程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a site map provider is configured and enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定管理站点导航配置的默认站点地图配置。A default site map configuration is specified that manages the site navigation configuration. 如果你选择编写自己的站点地图提供程序，则可以在 Web.config 文件中覆盖此配置。You can override this configuration in the Web.config file, should you choose to write your own site map provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web.config 配置节，该配置节演示如何将 对象声明为默认 对象。The following code example is a Web.config configuration section that demonstrates how an object is declared to be the default object. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Provider As SiteMapProvider
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapProvider ^ Provider { System::Web::SiteMapProvider ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前站点地图的默认 对象。

span.span: Gets the default object for the current site map.

value.span: 的默认站点地图提供程序。

span.span: The default site map provider for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，将 使用对象，并从位于站点根目录中的 web.config 文件加载站点导航数据。By default, the object is used and site navigation data is loaded from the Web.sitemap file that is located in the root directory of the site. 管理类中标识了此项，管理类用于管理站点导航配置和 Web.config 文件的 "站点地图配置" 部分。This is identified in the management classes that manage the site navigation configuration and the site map configuration section of the Web.config files. 默认情况下，它是类的实例 ，该类使用 web.config 文件作为其持久性存储区。By default, it is an instance of the class, which uses the Web.sitemap file as its persistent store. 但是，您可以通过编写实现抽象类的类来实现自己的站点地图存储和配置方案 。However, you can implement your own site map storage and configuration scheme by writing a class that implements the abstract class. 有关编写您自己的提供程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on writing your own provider, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用静态属性访问站点的默认对象 。The following code example demonstrates how to access the default object for the site by using the static property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/CS/catalog2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/VB/catalog2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The site map feature is not enabled.

exception.span: 配置中指定的默认提供程序不存在。

span.span: The default provider specified in the configuration does not exist.

exception.span: 只有在低信任或以上设置的情况下运行时，才支持此功能。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Providers As SiteMapProviderCollection
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapProviderCollection ^ Providers { System::Web::SiteMapProviderCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对 类可用的命名 对象的只读集合。

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of named objects that are available to the class.
A of named objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中列出的站点地图提供程序是在 配置层次结构中指定的站点地图提供程序，用于初始化 类。The site map providers that are listed in the collection are those that are specified in the configuration hierarchy to initialize the class. 在初始化期间仅保证使用默认提供程序（由 属性标识） ; 集合中的提供程序的存在 表示它是在配置中指定的，并且在初始化期间可用。Only the default provider (identified by the property) is guaranteed to be used by the during initialization; the presence of a provider in the collection means that it was specified in the configuration and was available during initialization. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从类中检索集合 ，然后循环访问该集合。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve the collection from the class, and then iterate through it. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/CS/catalog2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/VB/catalog2vb.aspx#1)] 如果你的站点不只是为站点配置的默认提供程序，则会看到每个提供程序都显示。If you have more than just the default provider configured for your site, you will see each provider displayed. 例如，如果使用的是示例 Microsoft Access 提供程序（请参阅 ），将看到以下输出：For example, if you are using the sample Microsoft Access provider (see ), you see the following output: ``` XmlSiteMapProvider System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider AccessSiteMapProvider Samples.AspNet.AccessSiteMapProvider ```

summary.span: 获取一个表示站点的导航结构的顶级页的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the top-level page of the navigation structure for the site.

value.span: 表示站点的导航结构的顶级页的 ；如果启用了安全修整且不能为当前用户返回该节点，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the top-level page of the site's navigation structure; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the node cannot be returned to the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类 通过从提供程序请求来检索属性。The class retrieves the property by requesting it from the provider. 如果存在提供程序层次结构， 类将在层次结构中检索根提供程序的根节点。If there is a provider hierarchy, the class retrieves the root node of the root provider in the hierarchy. 若要访问默认提供程序的根节点，请调用 属性，该属性检索默认提供程序及其 属性。To access the root node of the default provider, call the property, which retrieves both the default provider and its property. 对象是类的默认提供程序 ，它只支持一个 。The object, which is the default provider for the class, supports only one . 如果实现自己的 类并重写 abstract 属性，则必须提供自己的实现来跟踪 实例的属性 。If you implement your own class and override the abstract property, you must provide your own implementation to track the property of the instance. 根节点必须按设计对所有用户可见。The root node must be visible to all users, by design. 如果启用了安全修整时，根节点对所有用户都不可见，则访问 属性可能会导致 异常。If the root node is not visible to all users when security trimming is enabled, accessing the property might result in an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来检索 表示站点的根节点的对象，而不考虑页层次结构中的当前位置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the object that represents the root node of the site, regardless of the current location in the page hierarchy. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/CS/catalogcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/VB/catalogvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event SiteMapResolve As SiteMapResolveEventHandler

summary.span: 当访问 属性时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property is accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 订阅服务器将 对象附加到静态 事件，以便在访问属性时接收通知 。Subscribers attach a object to the static event to receive notification when the property is accessed. 这样，用户便可以在创建当前正在执行的页的表示形式时实现自定义逻辑， 而无需使用自定义提供程序实现。This enables the user to implement custom logic when creating a representation of the currently executing page without requiring a custom provider implementation. 如果订阅 事件，也会在 默认站点地图提供程序上订阅该事件。If you subscribe to the event, you also subscribe to the event on the default site map provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在 ASP.NET 网页上处理事件，以修改站点导航控件（如控件）显示的目标 url 。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event on an ASP.NET Web page to modify the target URLs that are displayed by a site navigation control, such as the control. 在此示例中，当前页面是联机公告板或论坛中的 post 页面。In this example, the current page is a post page in an online bulletin board or forum. 为了呈现更有意义的站点导航，导航控件显示的节点 Url 附加了上下文相关的查询字符串。In order to render more meaningful site navigation, the URLs of the nodes that are displayed by the navigation control are appended with context relevant query strings. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 站点导航基础结构可防止无限递归，这可提供一种保护措施，并最大限度地减少与 从类中访问属性关联的安全风险 。The ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure guards against infinite recursion, which provides a safeguard and minimizes the security risk that is associated with accessing the property from within the class. 下面的代码属于 global.asax 文件。The following code belongs in the Global.asax file. 对于应用程序，只会附加一次事件处理程序。The event handler will be attached only once for the application. 此代码将识别页面是否实现了 `ISiteMapResolver` 接口。The code recognizes whether the page implements the `ISiteMapResolver` interface. 如果实现了接口，则 `ExpandForumPaths` 调用函数。If the interface is implemented, the `ExpandForumPaths` function is called. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的代码定义了一个单独的接口。The following code defines a separate interface. （在网站项目中，您可以将此代码放在 App_Code 文件夹中。）`ISiteMapResolver`接口定义 `ExpandForumPaths` 方法。(In a Web site project, you can put this code in the App_Code folder.) The `ISiteMapResolver` interface defines the `ExpandForumPaths` method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx.vb#2)] 以下代码属于页面，该页面在站点映射结构中的深度至少为三个节点。The following code belongs with the page that is at least three nodes deep in the site-map structure. 该页实现了 `ISiteMapResolver` 接口，该接口允许 `ExpandForumPaths` 调用方法。The page implements the `ISiteMapResolver` interface, which enables the `ExpandForumPaths` method to be called. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx#3)]
